Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Holiday Inn Southend in Southend-on-Sea, you'll be near the airport and close to Southend-on-Sea City Hall and Southend Pier. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace Theatre and Beecroft Art Gallery.

Rooms
Stay in one of 129 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. Additional amenities include a fireplace in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Southend-on-Sea? This hotel has 140 square feet (13 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

When you stay at Holiday Inn Southend in Southend-on-Sea, you'll be near the airport and close to Southend-on-Sea City Hall and Southend Pier. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palace Theatre and Beecroft Art Gallery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Southend-on-Sea City Hall - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Palace Theatre - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Beecroft Art Gallery - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Cliffs Pavilion - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
New Empire Theatre - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Westcliff Gardens - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Southend Pier - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Adventure Island - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Belfairs Public Golf Course - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Southend Sea Life Centre - 4.3 km / 2.6 mi
Belfairs Woods - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Hockley Woods - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Hadleigh Farm - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Hadleigh Castle - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Salvation Army Farm Colony - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Southend is Southend-on-Sea (SEN-Southend Municipal) - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
